item.description:
Natasha has invited us to her home for a picnic/potluck she will provide hamburgers

If you are interested in going. please list on line what you will be bringing or go to Natasha's profile and e-mail her there look for the little envelope.

Â 

please bring a lawn Chair and whatever you want to drink

this event will be limited to twelve people, that is all she has room for so if you want to go

respond soon.
item.how_to_find_us: will give directions to people who are going

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: evening picnic or pot luck at Natasha's home
